flawed_nl_solution:
The taxes were 40*0.05=$2>>2.
So the price was 40+2=$42>>42.
He got a discount so the price he paid was 42-8=$34>>34.
Since he paid half his price was 34/2=$71>>71.
#### 71

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 71. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
